rating_comment:
A very convenient and comfortable place to stay with your family. Fans and aircon saved us from summer heat. Everything is like walking distance. Good food and many shopping options around to explore.
The host is very helpful and addressed our needs in a timely manner. Thanks a lot.

Rezwanul is a good host. Very responsive. I loved the property location. However, the property needs some maintenances work as the property is old. Out of 4 AC’s Two AC did not work. Some of the windows are very hard to open and close. One of the room’s Toilet flush had some issue. Everyone ( Caretaker, Maid, Guard at the gate) we interacted with were very friendly and helpful. If the above issues are fixed this property can be a good place to stay in Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed a few nights

rating_comment: The accommodation was great. Host was responsive. Felt athome. The decor was great.

Razwanul was a responsive, accommodating and proactive host. The location feels very secure and peaceful. Some of the issues raised during the stay were attended to promptly. Overall, I was pleased with the location, safety and the host’s sincerity towards improving my stay and the property in general, taking all feedback on board. I will rebook in future.
